channel.title: HELP HELP : PI Compiler bug?
channel.description:
[code]javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I get that everytime I run this: [code]@echo off COLOR 02 title Runescape Private Server Compiler- Pwn0r "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_25\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code]
These are all of my correct settings of my Java, anyone know why this is happening?

item.title: HELP HELP : PI Compiler bug?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Download an IDE and let it compile for you.

Read full topic

item.title: HELP HELP : PI Compiler bug?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

In the current directory there is no file with extension java. Try setting the directory to your source folder.
